Container.Name: binhex-official-gluetun
Container.Overview: Gluetun is a lightweight swiss-knife-like VPN client to tunnel to Cyberghost, ExpressVPN, FastestVPN, HideMyAss, IPVanish, IVPN, Mullvad, NordVPN, Perfect Privacy, Privado, PrivateVPN, ProtonVPN, PureVPN, Surfshark, TorGuard, VyprVPN, Windscribe servers using OpenVPN or Wireguard, iptables killswitch, DNS over TLS, ShadowSocks, and an HTTP proxy server.
Container.DonateText: If you appreciate my work, then please consider buying me a beer :D

Config.Name: Path: /gluetun
Config.Description: This is the container path to store gluetun related configuration.

Config.Name: Port: HTTP Control Server Port
Config.Description: HTTP Control Server port

Config.Name: Port: HTTP Proxy Port
Config.Description: HTTP Proxy port (when HTTPPROXY=on)

Config.Name: Port: Shadowsocks Port TCP
Config.Description: Shadowsocks port TCP (when SHADOWSOCKS=on)

Config.Name: Port: Shadowsocks Port UDP
Config.Description: Shadowsocks port UDP (when SHADOWSOCKS=on)

Config.Name: Variable: VPN_SERVICE_PROVIDER
Config.Description: Specify a supported VPN provider to use

Config.Name: Variable: VPN_TYPE
Config.Description: VPN protocol to use. Not all providers support Wireguard.

Config.Name: Variable: VPN_INTERFACE
Config.Description: Specify a custom network interface name to use

Config.Name: Variable: OPENVPN_USER
Config.Description: OpenVPN username (required for OpenVPN)

Config.Name: Variable: OPENVPN_PASSWORD
Config.Description: OpenVPN password (required for OpenVPN)

Config.Name: Variable: OPENVPN_PROTOCOL
Config.Description: Network protocol to use for OpenVPN

Config.Name: Variable: OPENVPN_VERSION
Config.Description: Set the OpenVPN version to run

Config.Name: Variable: OPENVPN_ENDPOINT_IP
Config.Description: Specify a target VPN server IP address to use

Config.Name: Variable: OPENVPN_ENDPOINT_PORT
Config.Description: Specify a target VPN server port number to use

Config.Name: Variable: OPENVPN_VERBOSITY
Config.Description: OpenVPN verbosity level (1-6)

Config.Name: Variable: OPENVPN_FLAGS
Config.Description: Space delimited OpenVPN flags to pass to openvpn

Config.Name: Variable: OPENVPN_ROOT
Config.Description: Run OpenVPN as root

Config.Name: Variable: OPENVPN_CIPHERS
Config.Description: Specify a custom cipher to use (e.g. aes-256-gcm)

Config.Name: Variable: OPENVPN_AUTH
Config.Description: Specify a custom auth algorithm to use (e.g. sha256)

Config.Name: Variable: OPENVPN_MSSFIX
Config.Description: Set the MSS fix parameter (0-9999, 0 to use defaults)

Config.Name: Variable: OPENVPN_CUSTOM_CONFIG
Config.Description: Path to custom OpenVPN configuration file for custom provider

Config.Name: Variable: WIREGUARD_PRIVATE_KEY
Config.Description: Wireguard client private key (required for Wireguard)

Config.Name: Variable: WIREGUARD_ADDRESSES
Config.Description: Wireguard IP network interface address (xx.xx.xx.xx/xx)

Config.Name: Variable: WIREGUARD_PUBLIC_KEY
Config.Description: Wireguard server public key

Config.Name: Variable: WIREGUARD_ENDPOINT_IP
Config.Description: Wireguard server endpoint IP address

Config.Name: Variable: WIREGUARD_ENDPOINT_PORT
Config.Description: Wireguard server endpoint port number

Config.Name: Variable: WIREGUARD_PRESHARED_KEY
Config.Description: Wireguard pre-shared key

Config.Name: Variable: WIREGUARD_ALLOWED_IPS
Config.Description: Wireguard peer allowed IPs (CSV format)

Config.Name: Variable: WIREGUARD_IMPLEMENTATION
Config.Description: Wireguard implementation to use

Config.Name: Variable: WIREGUARD_MTU
Config.Description: Wireguard MTU (1-65535)

Config.Name: Variable: WIREGUARD_PERSISTENT_KEEPALIVE_INTERVAL
Config.Description: Wireguard persistent keepalive interval (e.g. 25s)

Config.Name: Variable: SERVER_COUNTRIES
Config.Description: Comma separated list of countries

Config.Name: Variable: SERVER_REGIONS
Config.Description: Comma separated list of regions

Config.Name: Variable: SERVER_CITIES
Config.Description: Comma separated list of cities

Config.Name: Variable: SERVER_HOSTNAMES
Config.Description: Comma separated list of server hostnames

Config.Name: Variable: SERVER_NAMES
Config.Description: Comma separated list of server names

Config.Name: Variable: SERVER_CATEGORIES
Config.Description: Comma separated list of server categories (NordVPN)

Config.Name: Variable: VPN_PORT_FORWARDING
Config.Description: Enable custom port forwarding code for supported providers

Config.Name: Variable: VPN_PORT_FORWARDING_PROVIDER
Config.Description: Choose the custom port forwarding code to use

Config.Name: Variable: VPN_PORT_FORWARDING_STATUS_FILE
Config.Description: File path to use for writing the forwarded port obtained

Config.Name: Variable: VPN_PORT_FORWARDING_LISTENING_PORT
Config.Description: Port redirection for the VPN server side port forwarded

Config.Name: Variable: FIREWALL_VPN_INPUT_PORTS
Config.Description: Comma separated list of ports to allow from the VPN server side

Config.Name: Variable: FIREWALL_INPUT_PORTS
Config.Description: Comma separated list of ports to allow through the default interface

Config.Name: Variable: FIREWALL_DEBUG
Config.Description: Prints every firewall related command (debugging only)

Config.Name: Variable: FIREWALL_OUTBOUND_SUBNETS
Config.Description: Comma separated subnets that Gluetun is allowed to access

Config.Name: Variable: DOT
Config.Description: Activate DNS over TLS with Unbound

Config.Name: Variable: DOT_PROVIDERS
Config.Description: DNS over TLS providers (cloudflare, google, quad9, etc.)

Config.Name: Variable: DOT_CACHING
Config.Description: Unbound caching

Config.Name: Variable: DOT_PRIVATE_ADDRESS
Config.Description: All private CIDRs ranges. Comma separated list of CIDRs or single IP addresses Unbound won't resolve to. Note that the default setting prevents DNS rebinding

Config.Name: Variable: DOT_IPV6
Config.Description: DNS IPv6 resolution

Config.Name: Variable: DNS_UPDATE_PERIOD
Config.Description: Period to update block lists and restart Unbound

Config.Name: Variable: BLOCK_MALICIOUS
Config.Description: Block malicious hostnames and IPs with Unbound

Config.Name: Variable: BLOCK_SURVEILLANCE
Config.Description: Block surveillance hostnames and IPs with Unbound

Config.Name: Variable: BLOCK_ADS
Config.Description: Block ads hostnames and IPs with Unbound

Config.Name: Variable: UNBLOCK
Config.Description: Comma separated list of domain names to leave unblocked

Config.Name: Variable: DNS_ADDRESS
Config.Description: IP address to use as DNS resolver

Config.Name: Variable: DNS_KEEP_NAMESERVER
Config.Description: Keep /etc/resolv.conf untouched

Config.Name: Variable: HTTPPROXY
Config.Description: Enable the internal HTTP proxy

Config.Name: Variable: HTTPPROXY_LOG
Config.Description: Logs every tunnel requests

Config.Name: Variable: HTTPPROXY_LISTENING_ADDRESS
Config.Description: Internal listening address for the HTTP proxy

Config.Name: Variable: HTTPPROXY_USER
Config.Description: Username to use to connect to the HTTP proxy

Config.Name: Variable: HTTPPROXY_PASSWORD
Config.Description: Password to use to connect to the HTTP proxy

Config.Name: Variable: HTTPPROXY_STEALTH
Config.Description: Stealth mode means HTTP proxy headers are not added

Config.Name: Variable: SHADOWSOCKS
Config.Description: Enable the internal Shadowsocks proxy

Config.Name: Variable: SHADOWSOCKS_LOG
Config.Description: Enable Shadowsocks logging

Config.Name: Variable: SHADOWSOCKS_LISTENING_ADDRESS
Config.Description: Internal listening address for Shadowsocks

Config.Name: Variable: SHADOWSOCKS_PASSWORD
Config.Description: Password to use to connect to Shadowsocks

Config.Name: Variable: SHADOWSOCKS_CIPHER
Config.Description: AEAD Cipher to use for Shadowsocks

Config.Name: Variable: HTTP_CONTROL_SERVER_ADDRESS
Config.Description: Listening address for the HTTP control server

Config.Name: Variable: HTTP_CONTROL_SERVER_LOG
Config.Description: Enable logging of HTTP requests

Config.Name: Variable: HTTP_CONTROL_SERVER_AUTH_CONFIG_FILEPATH
Config.Description: Path to a TOML file containing authentication configuration

Config.Name: Variable: HEALTH_TARGET_ADDRESS
Config.Description: Address to ping on every internal health check

Config.Name: Variable: HEALTH_VPN_DURATION_INITIAL
Config.Description: Initial duration to wait for the VPN to be ready

Config.Name: Variable: HEALTH_VPN_DURATION_ADDITION
Config.Description: Additional duration to add for each consecutive VPN failure

Config.Name: Variable: HEALTH_SUCCESS_WAIT_DURATION
Config.Description: Duration to wait after a success check

Config.Name: Variable: HEALTH_SERVER_ADDRESS
Config.Description: Internal health check server listening address

Config.Name: Variable: UPDATER_PERIOD
Config.Description: Period to update VPN servers data (0 to disable)

Config.Name: Variable: UPDATER_MIN_RATIO
Config.Description: Ratio of servers to be found for update to succeed

Config.Name: Variable: UPDATER_VPN_SERVICE_PROVIDERS
Config.Description: List of providers to update servers data for

Config.Name: Variable: STORAGE_FILEPATH
Config.Description: Path of servers.json file (empty to disable caching)

Config.Name: Variable: TZ
Config.Description: Specify a timezone to use to have correct log times. i.e. Europe/London

Config.Name: Variable: PUID
Config.Description: User ID to run as non root

Config.Name: Variable: PGID
Config.Description: Group ID to run as non root

Config.Name: Variable: PUBLICIP_ENABLED
Config.Description: Check for public IP address information on VPN connection

Config.Name: Variable: PUBLICIP_API
Config.Description: Public IP echo service API to use

Config.Name: Variable: PUBLICIP_API_TOKEN
Config.Description: Optional API token for the public IP echo service

Config.Name: Variable: PUBLICIP_FILE
Config.Description: Filepath to store the public IP address assigned

Config.Name: Variable: VERSION_INFORMATION
Config.Description: Logs a message indicating if a newer version is available
